acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with no setters and collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithNoSettersAndCollectionsInTheConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.NoSetterWithCollectionInConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the List<?> [2JXQflDUsi, rNJ8fygDgU, wIfkPa97p0, 89s9O09sJN, A1nbmjHGj4] should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
Then the int field should not be zero
